title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.

Lack of opportunities to enter into the labor market is higher than any other categories with value 26.0, followed by Lack of funding and resources, and Lack of financial aid for low-income families and students. Down to category Others with the lowest value of 2.0.
The highest value at Lack of opportunities to enter into the labor market is almost 13.0 times larger than the minimum value of Others.
